text: :For the administrative province at the south-eastern part of the unrecognized Nagorno-Karabakh Republic, see Shushi Region Shusha (Azerbaijani: Şuşa) is a rayon of Azerbaijan. It surrounds the city of Shusha, in Nagorno-Karabakh, and is completely under control of the unrecognised Republic of Artsakh. ==References== Category:Districts of Azerbaijan Category:Azerbaijani administrative divisions of Artsakh
title: Shusha District
